entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: 20 Watch Games - Classic Pack
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：USD 0.99 → 免費 (免費 ~ USD 0.99)）

应用描述

A pack of 20 mini games for you to enjoy on your Apple Watch, Apple TV or your iPhone/iPad. ◉ Brick Puzzle Drag finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to drop. ◉ Jewel Blitz A match 3 game style. Detonate as many gems as you can in 60s. ◉ Gold Miner Aim on the gold while the hook swings. Tap on the screen to release the hook. ◉ Number Puzzle Swipe to combine numbers for score. ◉ Sudoku (6x6) Fill in all the empty squares without using the same number twice in each column, row, or box. ◉ Bubble Shooter Tap to shoot bubble. ◉ Find Word With 4 letters, you have 10s to find a word. If time runs out, you lose. ◉ Color Lines Remove balls by forming lines (horizontal, vertical or diagonal) of at least five balls of the same color. Get the highscore! ◉ Mine Sweeper Tap to reveal a square. If a square containing a mine, you lose. Reveal all square to win. ◉ Brick Breaker Drag your finger to move your paddle and hit the ball. Destroy all the blocks to finish levels. ◉ Maze Man Swipe to change direction, collect all things on the map but don't touch the devil! ◉ Boxing Tap left/right to move, mid to punch.. ◉ Crazy Tennis Feel like crazy while playing with AI. Drag your finger to move your paddle. Don't let the ball out. ◉ Block Ninja Control the ninja to avoid all spikes and get best score. ◉ Tappy Bird Tap the screen to fly up. Don't hit anything. ◉ Snake Swipe to change snake direction. ◉ Tic-Tac-Toe Challenge your brain with the AI. ◉ Pin Hack Find the pin number before timeout. ◉ ATM Use your math skill to give the right money request. ◉ What Number Find the next number of a number chain. => On Apple Watch please use Digital Crown to exit game. Thanks for all your feedback!!!

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad
